channel.title: Stocks on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Catalog - Stocks - simple Filter Stocks
item.description: BO - Catalog - Stocks - simple Filter Stocks Details Component : Core Status : Sandbox Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-838 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to Catalog > Stocks Stock management page is displayed Search by name Criteria : ‘Hummingbird printed t-shirt’ number of element in grid after filter < total of element in grid

item.description: BO - Catalog - Stocks - Update Quantity by setting input Details Component : Core Status : Sandbox Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-840 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to catalog Stocks Title contains ‘Stocks *' Number of element in grid > 0 Filter by name Criteria : ‘Mountain fox - Vector graphics’ Number of element in grid < Total of elements in grid

item.title: BO - Catalog - Stocks - Filter Stocks by Status
item.description: BO - Catalog - Stocks - Filter Stocks by Status Details Component : Core Status : Sandbox Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-842 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to products page page title contains ‘Products’ Reset filters total of products > 0 Create disabled product Product created Go to stocks page Page title contains ‘Stocks’ Filter by status = disabled New product created is displayed in list Go back to products page and delete product Product successfully deleted

item.title: BO - Catalog - Stocks - Help Button
item.description: BO - Catalog - Stocks - Help Button Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-845 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/03_catalog/08_stocks/06_helpCard.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Catalog > Stocks page The Stocks page well displayed Click on Help The documentation modal is opened in English Close the modal The modal is well closed
